verses.verse: Then <WH227> Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> the Reubenites,<WH7206> and the Gadites,<WH1425> and the half<WH2677> tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh,<WH4519>

And said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Ye<WH859> have kept<WH8104> <WH853> all<WH3605> that<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> you, and have obeyed<WH8085> my voice<WH6963> in all<WH3605> that<WH834> I commanded<WH6680> you:

Ye have not<WH3808> left<WH5800> <WH853> your brethren<WH251> these<WH2088> many<WH7227> days<WH3117> unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> but have kept<WH8104> <WH853> the charge<WH4931> of the commandment<WH4687> of the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

And now<WH6258> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath given rest<WH5117> unto your brethren,<WH251> as<WH834> he promised<WH1696> them: therefore now<WH6258> return<WH6437> ye, and get<WH1980> you unto your tents,<WH168> and unto<WH413> the land<WH776> of your possession,<WH272> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> gave<WH5414> you on the other side<WH5676> Jordan.<WH3383>

But <WH7535> take diligent<WH3966> heed<WH8104> to do<WH6213> <WH853> the commandment<WH4687> and the law,<WH8451> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> charged<WH6680> you, to love<WH157> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and to walk<WH1980> in all<WH3605> his ways,<WH1870> and to keep<WH8104> his commandments,<WH4687> and to cleave<WH1692> unto him, and to serve<WH5647> him with all<WH3605> your heart<WH3824> and with all<WH3605> your soul.<WH5315>
So Joshua<WH3091> blessed<WH1288> them, and sent them away:<WH7971> and they went<WH1980> unto<WH413> their tents.<WH168>

Now to the one half<WH2677> of the tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519> Moses<WH4872> had given<WH5414> possession in Bashan:<WH1316> but unto the other half<WH2677> thereof gave<WH5414> Joshua<WH3091> among<WH5973> their brethren<WH251> on this side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> westward.<WH3220> And when<WH3588> Joshua<WH3091> sent them away<WH7971> also<WH1571> unto<WH413> their tents,<WH168> then he blessed<WH1288> them,

And he spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> them, saying,<WH559> Return<WH7725> with much<WH7227> riches<WH5233> unto<WH413> your tents,<WH168> and with very<WH3966> much<WH7227> cattle,<WH4735> with silver,<WH3701> and with gold,<WH2091> and with brass,<WH5178> and with iron,<WH1270> and with very<WH3966> much<WH7235> raiment:<WH8008> divide<WH2505> the spoil<WH7998> of your enemies<WH341> with<WH5973> your brethren.<WH251>

And the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519> returned,<WH7725> and departed<WH1980> from<WH4480> <WH854> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> out of Shiloh,<WH4480> <WH7887> which<WH834> is in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> to go<WH1980> unto<WH413> the country<WH776> of Gilead,<WH1568> to<WH413> the land<WH776> of their possession,<WH272> whereof<WH834> they were possessed,<WH270> according<WH5921> to the word<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> by the hand<WH3027> of Moses.<WH4872>

And when they came<WH935> unto<WH413> the borders<WH1552> of Jordan,<WH3383> that<WH834> are in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519> built<WH1129> there<WH8033> an altar<WH4196> by<WH5921> Jordan,<WH3383> a great<WH1419> altar<WH4196> to see<WH4758> to.

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> heard<WH8085> say,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519> have built<WH1129> <WH853> an altar<WH4196> over against<WH413> <WH4136> the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> in<WH413> the borders<WH1552> of Jordan,<WH3383> at<WH413> the passage<WH1552> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And when the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> heard<WH8085> of it, the whole<WH3605> congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> gathered themselves together<WH6950> at Shiloh,<WH7887> to go<WH5927> up to war<WH6635> against<WH5921> them.

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> sent<WH7971> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> and to<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Gad,<WH1410> and to<WH413> the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh,<WH4519> into<WH413> the land<WH776> of Gilead,<WH1568> <WH853> Phinehas<WH6372> the son<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548>

And with<WH5973> him ten<WH6235> princes,<WH5387> of each chief<WH5387> <WH259> <WH5387> <WH259> house<WH1004> a prince<WH1> throughout all<WH3605> the tribes<WH4294> of Israel;<WH3478> and each one<WH376> was a head<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1> among the thousands<WH505> of Israel.<WH3478>

And they came<WH935> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> and to<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Gad,<WH1410> and to<WH413> the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh,<WH4519> unto<WH413> the land<WH776> of Gilead,<WH1568> and they spoke<WH1696> with<WH854> them, saying,<WH559>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the whole<WH3605> congregation<WH5712> of the LORD,<WH3068> What<WH4100> trespass<WH4604> is this<WH2088> that<WH834> ye have committed<WH4603> against the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> to turn away<WH7725> this day<WH3117> from following<WH4480> <WH310> the LORD,<WH3068> in that ye have built<WH1129> you an altar,<WH4196> that ye might rebel<WH4775> this day<WH3117> against the LORD?<WH3068>

Is <WH853> the iniquity<WH5771> of Peor<WH6465> too little<WH4592> for us, from<WH4480> which<WH834> we are not<WH3808> cleansed<WH2891> until<WH5704> this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> although there was<WH1961> a plague<WH5063> in the congregation<WH5712> of the LORD,<WH3068>

But that ye<WH859> must turn away<WH7725> this day<WH3117> from following<WH4480> <WH310> the LORD?<WH3068> and it will be,<WH1961> seeing ye<WH859> rebel<WH4775> today<WH3117> against the LORD,<WH3068> that tomorrow<WH4279> he will be wroth<WH7107> with<WH413> the whole<WH3605> congregation<WH5712> of Israel.<WH3478>

Notwithstanding, <WH389> if<WH518> the land<WH776> of your possession<WH272> be unclean,<WH2931> then pass ye over<WH5674> unto<WH413> the land<WH776> of the possession<WH272> of the LORD,<WH3068> wherein<WH834> the LORD's<WH3068> tabernacle<WH4908> dwelleth,<WH7931> <WH8033> and take possession<WH270> among<WH8432> us: but rebel<WH4775> not<WH408> against the LORD,<WH3068> nor<WH408> rebel<WH4775> against us, in building<WH1129> you an altar<WH4196> beside<WH4480> <WH1107> the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> our God.<WH430>

Did not<WH3808> Achan<WH5912> the son<WH1121> of Zerah<WH2226> commit<WH4603> a trespass<WH4604> in the accursed thing,<WH2764> and wrath<WH7110> fell<WH1961> on<WH5921> all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of Israel?<WH3478> and that<WH1931> man<WH376> perished<WH1478> not<WH3808> alone<WH259> in his iniquity.<WH5771>

Then the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519> answered,<WH6030> and said<WH1696> unto<WH853> the heads<WH7218> of the thousands<WH505> of Israel,<WH3478>

The LORD<WH3068> God<WH410> of gods,<WH430> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH410> of gods,<WH430> he<WH1931> knoweth,<WH3045> and Israel<WH3478> he<WH1931> shall know;<WH3045> if<WH518> it be in rebellion,<WH4777> or if<WH518> in transgression<WH4604> against the LORD,<WH3068> (save<WH3467> us not<WH408> this<WH2088> day,)<WH3117>

That we have built<WH1129> us an altar<WH4196> to turn<WH7725> from following<WH4480> <WH310> the LORD,<WH3068> or if<WH518> to offer<WH5927> thereon<WH5921> burnt offering<WH5930> or meat offering,<WH4503> or if<WH518> to offer<WH6213> peace<WH8002> offerings<WH2077> thereon,<WH5921> let the LORD<WH3068> himself<WH1931> require<WH1245> it;

And if<WH518> we have not<WH3808> rather done<WH6213> <WH853> it<WH2063> for fear<WH4480> <WH1674> of this thing,<WH4480> <WH1697> saying,<WH559> In time to come<WH4279> your children<WH1121> might speak<WH559> unto our children,<WH1121> saying,<WH559> What<WH4100> have ye to do with the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel?<WH3478>

For the LORD<WH3068> hath made<WH5414> <WH853> Jordan<WH3383> a border<WH1366> between<WH996> us and you, ye children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and children<WH1121> of Gad;<WH1410> ye have no<WH369> part<WH2506> in the LORD:<WH3068> so shall your children<WH1121> make<WH853> our children<WH1121> cease<WH7673> from fearing<WH3372> <WH853> the LORD.<WH3068>
Therefore we said,<WH559> Let us now<WH4994> prepare<WH6213> to build<WH1129> us<WH853> an altar,<WH4196> not<WH3808> for burnt<WH5930> offering, nor<WH3808> for sacrifice: <WH2077>

But <WH3588> that it<WH1931> may be a witness<WH5707> between<WH996> us, and you, and our generations<WH1755> after<WH310> us, that we might do<WH5647> <WH853> the service<WH5656> of the LORD<WH3068> before<WH6440> him with our burnt offerings,<WH5930> and with our sacrifices,<WH2077> and with our peace offerings;<WH8002> that your children<WH1121> may not<WH3808> say<WH559> to our children<WH1121> in time to come,<WH4279> Ye have no<WH369> part<WH2506> in the LORD.<WH3068>

Therefore said<WH559> we, that it shall be,<WH1961> when<WH3588> they should so say<WH559> to<WH413> us or to<WH413> our generations<WH1755> in time to come,<WH4279> that we may say<WH559> again, Behold<WH7200> <WH853> the pattern<WH8403> of the altar<WH4196> of the LORD,<WH3068> which<WH834> our fathers<WH1> made,<WH6213> not<WH3808> for burnt offerings,<WH5930> nor<WH3808> for sacrifices;<WH2077> but<WH3588> it<WH1931> is a witness<WH5707> between<WH996> us and you.

God forbid<WH2486> that we<WH4480> should rebel<WH4775> against the LORD,<WH3068> and turn<WH7725> this day<WH3117> from following<WH4480> <WH310> the LORD,<WH3068> to build<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> for burnt offerings,<WH5930> for meat offerings,<WH4503> or for sacrifices,<WH2077> beside<WH4480> <WH905> the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> that<WH834> is before<WH6440> his tabernacle.<WH4908>

And when Phinehas<WH6372> the priest,<WH3548> and the princes<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> and heads<WH7218> of the thousands<WH505> of Israel<WH3478> which<WH834> were with<WH854> him, heard<WH8085> <WH853> the words<WH1697> that<WH834> the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the children<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> spoke,<WH1696> it pleased<WH3190> <WH5869> them.

And Phinehas<WH6372> the son<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> said<WH559> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> and to<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Gad,<WH1410> and to<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Manasseh,<WH4519> This day<WH3117> we perceive<WH3045> that<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> is among<WH8432> us, because<WH834> ye have not<WH3808> committed<WH4603> this<WH2088> trespass<WH4604> against the LORD:<WH3068> now<WH227> ye have delivered<WH5337> <WH853> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> out of the hand<WH4480> <WH3027> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And Phinehas<WH6372> the son<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and the princes,<WH5387> returned<WH7725> from<WH4480> <WH854> the children<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> and from<WH4480> <WH854> the children<WH1121> of Gad,<WH1410> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Gilead,<WH1568> unto<WH413> the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> to<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and brought them word again.<WH7725> <WH853> <WH1697>

And the thing<WH1697> pleased<WH3190> <WH5869> the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> blessed<WH1288> God,<WH430> and did not<WH3808> intend<WH559> to go up<WH5927> against<WH5921> them in battle,<WH6635> to destroy<WH7843> <WH853> the land<WH776> wherein<WH834> the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and Gad<WH1410> dwelt.<WH3427>

And the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> called<WH7121> the altar<WH4196> Ed: for<WH3588> it<WH1931> shall be a witness<WH5707> between<WH996> us that<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> is God.<WH430>
